name: Sunrise (itch) (jake1025)
description:
Use your Viking powers to return the sunlight to your village. 

Press E to pray at the shrines. 

DISCLAIMER:

This was a school project for Advanced Game Design (GMAP 395). It was done as an exercise in the use of visual effects, volumetric lighting, game manager scripts, unity animation controllers, etc.  See the credits.txt file for all the assets and references used. Also, make sure you've got a decent computer before trying to run this, the volumetric lighting causes significant performance dips .
